fields.title: Syria - Conflict ETC Situation Report #59 (Reporting period: 01/03/2023 to 30/04/2023)
fields.body:
**HIGHLIGHTS**

- The ETC installed a dedicated solar power system for the VHF radio repeater at the UN hub in Damascus to ensure uninterrupted coverage after a fault with the existing power supply system caused a temporary outage.

- The cluster also replaced a faulty antenna on one of the VHF radio base stations in the Damascus Security Operations Centre (SOC) and completed all routine annual maintenance of communications equipment in the SOC.

- Approval was received from the authorities to conduct a mission to Hama from 7-15 May to install a VHF radio repeater. The installation will expand radio coverage in rural Hama to support the scale-u

  • The cluster also replaced a faulty antenna on one of the VHF radio base stations in the Damascus Security Operations Centre (SOC) and completed all routine annual maintenance of communications equipment in the SOC.

  • Approval was received from the authorities to conduct a mission to Hama from 7-15 May to install a VHF radio repeater. The installation will expand radio coverage in rural Hama to support the scale-u

text:
# Syria - Conflict ETC Situation Report #59 (Reporting period: 01/03/2023 to 30/04/2023)

**HIGHLIGHTS**

- The ETC installed a dedicated solar power system for the VHF radio repeater at the UN hub in Damascus to ensure uninterrupted coverage after a fault with the existing power supply system caused a temporary outage.

- The cluster also replaced a faulty antenna on one of the VHF radio base stations in the Damascus Security Operations Centre (SOC) and completed all routine annual maintenance of communications equipment in the SOC.

- Approval was received from the authorities to conduct a mission to Hama from 7-15 May to install a VHF radio repeater. The installation will expand radio coverage in rural Hama to support the scale-u
summary: The ETC installed a dedicated solar power system and replaced a faulty antenna in the Damascus Security Operations Centre (SOC) to ensure uninterrupted coverage. Approval was received to conduct a mission to Hama from 7-15 May to install a VHF radio repeater, which will expand radio coverage in rural Hama.
